content: stay stylish and warm in this modern herringbone stitch crochet twist head warmer this project creates a classic looking fall and winter staple for those cold weather months you can make a baby toddler kids or adult size ear warmer with these instructions *please note that this is an ad-free detailed pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free at **www lakesideloops com/harley** 1 * in an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible the pattern includes **written pattern in english us terms pictures video tutorial left hand pattern available upon request** *all patterns and photographs are the property of lakeside loops©* **all finished products from our patterns may be used for local sales and sold online ** thank you for looking kind wishes lakeside loops www lakesideloops com 1 https //www lakesideloops com/harley
